about_the_game:
Assemble a team of mythical heroes and battle other players in a time-warped tavern!

Mythical Heroes Unite, Unique Team Compositions

The current version features 75 cards, including 52 legendary heroes from Greek and Norse mythology.
Each hero comes with a unique passive skill!
More heroes from Cthulhu Mythos, Chinese legends, Japanese folklore, and other cultural backgrounds will be added in future updates.

Every round, 3-5 random heroes will be offered for you to choose from. Strategize and build your ultimate team to dominate the battlefield!

Unique Positioning Mechanics

Positioning matters! Where you place your heroes not only affects your battle strategy but also activates interactions between them.

6 Summoners Available Now

  • The Bullet-Selling Girl: Heroes closer to her gain increased attack speed!

  • Cleopatra: Enemies from left to right receive decreasing vulnerability effects (10%/8%/6%/4%/2%).

  • King Arthur: Heroes closer to him gain higher shield values at the start of each round.

  • Robin Hood: Enemies from left to right receive increasing attack bonuses (10%/8%/6%/4%/2%).

  • Leonidas: Heroes closer to him gain significantly increased max HP!

Endless Strategies with Bonds and Factions

The game features 12 hero bonds and 12 factions, allowing for endless combinations:

  • Focus on protecting a core hero, or go for an economy-based "Gold Rush" strategy?

  • Try the high-risk, high-reward "Blood for Power" playstyle, or experiment with the eerie "Hero Devouring" tactic?
    With your creativity and strategic mind, you can explore dozens of playstyles and experience the thrill of unique, brain-bending strategies!

Real-Time PvP, Climb the Rank Ladder

Battle against real players' teams! Through matches of wits and strategy, climb the ranks and prove your tactical prowess!

Hand-Drawn Art, A Fantasy Tavern Comes to Life

From hero designs to scene depictions, everything is hand-drawn and original, featuring a unique style and vivid details. Immerse yourself in a whimsical, imaginative world!
